ygData.subject: RE: Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: nod, but I ve made a newbie cleric and max d dex up, and the items did nothing....so that s why I say the DEX is useless...I should have clarifed....heh...i
ygData.messageBody:
nod, but I've made a newbie cleric and max'd dex up, and the items did
nothing....so that's why I say the DEX is useless...I should have
clarifed....heh...i have a problem doing that sometimes ;)

ya mine is not much better....

Jaxim

> >QUEST. Read and you might learn what I stated: The SSOL seems to be
> >BROKEN....the quest says one thing....the weapon and its description say
> >another.....I'd say that is BROKEN. A typo is the process of messing up
> >SPELLING or grammar.....they COMPLETELY MISWORDED THE DESCRIPTION. They
> >didnt go and say: It will cleanse you of all illnesses....it says it
>will
> >give to you a strength that slowly drains you (or something close to
>that.)
> >and that the woman behind the counter can refresh the charge. How the
>HELL
> >is that a typo dude?
> >
